it.polimi.se2018.client.network

Interface ClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiHandler, SocketHandler

    public interface ClientInterface
    interface ClientInterface: interface that represent all the possible input that the client can send to the server, it has all the method signature that the classes that implements the interface have to respect.
    Author:
    fadda=-miceli-mundo

    • Method Summary
